name: Supply Chain (HoraceMalum, shuffles)
description:
Supply Chain is a turret defense game where the player drives a supply truck to deliver ammunition to the turrets to keep them firing. Use points earned from destroyed enemies to purchase upgrades or new turrets.

This game was made for the Legacy MOB Game Jam #16. The theme was "No Ammo", and we decided to go with the premise that if the turrets have no ammo, the defense is over. We hope you enjoy our submission!
